lines: Mom must get her teeth fixed, and you must go with her to the dentist. You sit in the waiting room for a very, very long time. Mom must run out and put money in the parking meter. Mom sits you on the floor, gives you a magazine to leaf
through, and tells you to behave.
Now you're feeling a bit more comfortable. A nosy lady spies you from the corner of her eye. (What's she looking at?) Your sock is crooked.
#IGNORE THE SOCK AND TEAR PAGES FROM THE MAGAZINE
Funny thing about socks, the way they stretch all the way out before they snap off your feet. You decide to take both of them off. (The lady looks at you again.) Where's Mom?
#CLIMB UP ON THE CHAIR AND LOOK OUT THE WINDOW
#VISIT THE NURSE ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE BIG GLASS
Mom is on her way back in. She sees you with no socks and shoes on and feels embarrassed. The nosy lady gives her a full report.
#WALK OVER AND STICK YOUR TONGUE OUT AT HER

You give her your worst face and get whacked on the bottom lightly by your mom, who secretly approves of what you did. When you leave, she buys you a big ice cream to make up for feeling guilty about patting you on the rear.
Good choice. Nothing can get on a grown-up person's nerves like a bratty kid who won't be controlled by scowls and ugly faces. Now what do you want to do?
The nurse is too busy to pay attention to you, even though you work up the courage to go right near her.
The nurse sees you and gives you a big kiss. She points to a big box full of toys and asks you to go pick one out for yourself.
That was very polite of you, considering she really wasn't looking and you could have stuffed another one in your pocket. You are becoming a very trustworthy little girl.

Of course, the nurse was too busy to see you sneak two little toys out of the box instead of one, and probably wouldn't care anyway. Unfortunately, behavior like this doesn't go unnoticed by everyone. You get away with it this time, but
please be more careful later, when you fill out your tax return.
#GO BACK AND SIT QUIETLY WHILE MOM GETS HER TEETH FIXED
What a well-behaved girl. You amuse yourself by looking through the magazines. What's this? A LADY WITH NO CLOTHES ON! Mom will never believe this. How silly!
Your coordination isn't terrific. As you lift the magazine, the cover tears with a loud R-I-I-I-P. A lady spies you from the corner of her eye and gives you a dirty look.
#STICK YOUR TONGUE OUT AT HER AND GIVE HER A RASPBERRY

Doesn't she have anything better to do than pick on poor defenseless little kids? It was only an accident--but it was a fun accident which will probably happen again... R-I-I-I-P!... and again... R-I-I-I-P!
You learned how to make that noise from TV. The lady tells your mother that you are disrespectful, which causes her embarrassment. You hear her mutter some of the bad words under her breath.
#REPEAT THE BAD WORDS TO THE LADY, BECAUSE SHE PROBABLY DIDN'T HEAR THEM
#CLIMB UP ON MOM'S LAP AND RELAX

You yell out the bad words to the lady, causing everyone in the waiting room to chuckle and shake their heads. They are grateful that all of their children are grown-up and married. Your mother is completely mortified, but she'll get
Good. Climbing up on Mom's lap makes her feel like the two of you are a team. This is an important mother-daughter bond that will come in handy if you do something REALLY stupid later.
What a little angel! The lady says, "Come here, you little doll!"
Your social sphere takes a wicked hop. You are all set to develop the charm and grace that can really take you places. The lady gives you a nice, thick piece of chocolate. Yum!

Before you know it, she would have been slobbering all over your face. On the other hand, she was about to give you a piece of candy. Playing shy causes her to make noises at you. (Why do they all do that?) They make her look absolutely
ridiculous. You walk over and attach yourself to Mom's leg.
Your ability to keep yourself amused is a sign of early maturity. This will help you intellectually and creatively.
